job description:
Senior Data Engineer
If you are a Senior Data Engineer with experience, please read on!

We are a top international company whose app quickly rose to the #1 spot in Asia, and since then, we've expanded into the US and UK. We are looking to add a few talented Senior Data Engineers to our team in the Bay area!

What You Will Be Doing
  • Design, build and operate ETL pipeline at scale.
  • Development and operation of API/tools related to data products and machine learning products.
  • Automation of processes related to data products and machine learning products.
What You Need for this Position
MS/ PhD in Computer Science or equivalent
At Least 3 Years of experience and knowledge of:
  • Machine Learning
  • ETL
  • API Tools
  • Experience building out Data Pipelines
Nice to Haves:
  • Apache Airflow
  • Container: Docker/Kubernets
  • Cloud: Google Cloud
  • Beam or Spark
What's In It for You
Competitive compensation package DOE, comprehensive benefits package, generous PTO, great company culture, and more!

This is an urgent role with ongoing interviews, so please answer the screening questions to expedite your application process!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
